mapper.insert: insert into videos (v_sid, v_type, v_origin_name, v_name, v_path, v_comment, v_upload_time, v_timestamp, user_account, v_note) values (#{vSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update videos set v_type = #{vType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_origin_name = #{vOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_name = #{vName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_path = #{vPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_comment = #{vComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_upload_time = #{vUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, v_timestamp = #{vTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_note = #{vNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where v_sid = #{vSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select v_sid, v_type, v_origin_name, v_name, v_path, v_comment, v_upload_time, v_timestamp, user_account, v_note from videos where v_sid = #{vSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select v_sid, v_type, v_origin_name, v_name, v_path, v_comment, v_upload_time, v_timestamp, user_account, v_note from videos
